name: Market Awareness Raising for Opportunities in Needed Extensification and Soil-friendly Agriculture
description: The LIFE MARONESA project will tackle the abandonment of mountain pasture areas for Maronesa cattle on common land. It will set up an integrated framework to encourage climate action in the project area.
lead: AguiarFloresta - Associação Florestal e Ambiental de Vila Pouca de Aguiar
